requirements.summary: Retry the deployment of Version 42 to production network after resolving the previous deployment error
acceptanceCriteria: Version 42 successfully deploys to production without errors
Application is accessible on the production URL
All existing functionality (clients, tasks, assignees, todos) works correctly after deployment

file_operations.description: Verify the HTML entry point has proper diagnostic logging enabled for monitoring deployment success and detecting any HTTP 503 errors or asset loading issues that might occur during redeployment
Confirm the root application component's error handling and 30-second loading timeout detection are properly configured to catch any deployment-related initialization issues
Ensure the error boundary is properly catching and logging any startup errors that might occur during the redeployment process

Verify the asset loading diagnostics utility is properly intercepting fetch and script errors, with special attention to HTTP 503 error detection to identify any deployment-related asset loading failures
